channel.title: Need a source like this: (read)
channel.description:
I Need a source but i suck at coding and when i try to re-name the server the source gets messed up...
all i need is: Home area at chaos altar (with 3 portals, 1 to shops, 1 to jad and 1 to green dragons at lvl 21 wildy
Custom mod admin and owner armor
pickup (::pickup (itemID) (Amount) ) mod only
a mod+admin only area (also accessible by owner) admin only area (also accessible by owner)
working dclaws (not needed but it would be nice)
SHOPS: ::shops (located at chaos altar) npc = thesilia (or whatever) rares store... contains all rares
npc = bandit shopkeeper (or whatever) how2gamescape magic store full ghostly robes full enchanted robes full dagon'hai all enchanted robes all elemental staffs battlestaffs and mystic staffs all runes
npc = nurmof noob armor full bronze bronze scimi full iron iron scimi full steel steel scimi full mithril Mithril Scimi full adamanT Addy scimi full rune Rune scimi
npc = bob Skillcapes shops has all skillcapes and hoods (except summoning hunting and construction)
npc = niles Pk shop 1 Full dragon (with platebody as a custom) (not needed but i really want drag pl8 on my serv) All Dragon Weapons Amulet of fury Magic bow (working spec with 50% drain pl0x?) Dark bow Rune arrows Rune Cbow Dragon bolts Onyx bolts Tzhaar-ket-om Granite maul
Npc = giles Pk Shop 2 Amulet of fury Berserker ring Combar ring Seer's ring Archer's ring Abyssal Whip
::pkbox
Tzhaar fight caves with the entrance area as the safe spot Bank booths block the exit Lowe is waiting next to 1 of the bank booths selling pk supplies (SAME IS PK SHOP 2 but has full drag and good weps too) There are danger signs 4 squares away from the bank booths Example: [IMG]http://i401.photobucket.com/albums/pp99/nlo127/180px-Fight_Caves_Map.png[/img]
Key: Yellow - Warning Signs Red - Bank Booths Green - Safe spot Brown - Pvp area Purple - Lowe Gray - Wall I removed the lava on this map so dont get confused

item.title: Need a source like this: (read)
item.dc:creator: @3p1cpkz 3p1cpkz
item.description:
@3p1cpkz wrote:

WELL THERES ANOTHER PROBLEM!
my jdk was messed up because one of the compilers from one of the sources i downloaded deleted some of the files from jdk… and it says i dont have jdk… but heres the prob:
when i try to dl it says it IS installed and when i try to reinstall it it just comes back to the message “its already installed” and it wont reinstall uninstall and i cant find the files at all on my computer… therefore i cant compile… thats why i need someone else to code for me

Read full topic

item.description:
@demno wrote:

This is in the wrong section, please go to request and suggestions, get some info on how to make custum items. How to change names, and the home, watch some videos google it, go to some tuts.

We work hard to make our servers, were not just gonna make one so you can leech it from the coder of the server and give no credits, no you need to learn how.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a source like this: (read)
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

Just download a source.

Just change the starterplace:
Home area at chaos altar

Just make some portals. You know objects…:
with 3 portals, 1 to shops, 1 to jad and 1 to green dragons at lvl 21 wildy

Recoulor a Rune Platebody. Or just make a model:
Custom mod admin and owner armor

OMG?..pickup (::pickup (itemID) (Amount) ) mod only:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Make area on a high 2 or somthing for anti noclip. And a command to tele there.
Mod+:
a mod+admin only area (also accessible by owner)
admin only area (also accessible by owner)

Make a command.
Add some shops in config…
Add rare stuff in rare shop…

::shops (located at chaos altar)
npc = thesilia (or whatever)
rares store… contains all rares

::pkbox
Make a wild area:

Tzhaar fight caves with the entrance area as the safe spot
Bank booths block the exit
Lowe is waiting next to 1 of the bank booths selling pk supplies (SAME IS PK SHOP 2 but has full drag and good weps too)
There are danger signs 4 squares away from the bank booths

Make a wild area add some object and NPCs

Read full topic
